name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Developer Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **.NET**, **C#**, **Web API**, **SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proven expertise in developing scalable web applications using **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **NestJS**, **React**, and **Angular**. Strong commitment to best practices including **Agile**, **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, and **automated testing** to enhance code quality. Demonstrated ability to tackle complex problems and communicate effectively in a team-oriented environment. Leveraged technologies such as **AWS** to deliver impactful solutions in financial applications and AI/ML projects, contributing to successful initiatives in leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services using **.NET** and **C#** for seamless user onboarding and document automation.
Developed and integrated **Web API** solutions with **PostgreSQL** to enhance the reporting workflows, optimizing query performance by **50%**.
Implemented **TypeScript** and **JavaScript** based frontend solutions using **React** and **Angular** in an Agile environment, improving user engagement metrics by **30%**.
Collaborated in CI/CD pipelines leveraging **Azure App Services** and **DevOps** practices to ensure rapid deployment cycles with a release cadence of every **2 weeks**.
Ensured code quality and efficiency through automated testing, reducing bug reports by **25%** and improving overall performance metrics.
Facilitated cross-functional communication to solve integration issues and ensure compliance with regulatory standards, achieving project milestones on time and within budget.
Led problem-solving sessions to tackle complex system challenges, leveraging innovative strategies that resulted in a **15%** increase in operational efficiency.

Utilized **.NET** and **C#** to develop robust web APIs for backend systems, enhancing document workflows and user onboarding processes.
Implemented **SQL** and **PostgreSQL** databases to streamline data management and optimize complex reporting, achieving a **35%** reduction in query response times.
Led the creation of microservices employing **NestJS** and **React**, ensuring asynchronous processing and integration with **Azure** services, scaling user requests by **50%**.
Managed the deployment of applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, achieving consistent environments across **3** different stages (development, testing, production).
Designed and executed testing strategies within a **CI/CD** pipeline, improving deployment efficiency by **40%** through automated testing practices.
Conducted thorough code reviews to maintain high **code quality** standards and implemented **Agile** methodologies to enhance team collaboration and project adaptability.
Facilitated problem-solving sessions with cross-functional teams, ensuring effective communication and timely resolution of integration challenges, leading to a **20%** improvement in project delivery timelines.

Developed robust **.NET** backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, optimizing processes and enhancing trading operations.
Engineered real-time price feed processors leveraging **Web API**, **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, delivering up-to-the-minute trading data for **high-frequency transactions** at a rate of over **1000 messages per second**.
Collaborated effectively with frontend teams using **C#**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular** to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, by implementing best practices in **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**, along with maintaining internal data security protocols.
Implemented comprehensive test suites with **automated testing** frameworks including **PyTest** and **tox**, improving code quality and streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, resulting in **60% fewer bugs** in production.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery**, **RabbitMQ**, and **AWS** to optimize backend task execution and enhance process management, improving task completion times by **30%**.

skills:
Programming Languages:
	C#, .NET, SQL, TypeScript, JavaScript, Python (3.8+), Bash

**Backend Frameworks:**
	FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery, NestJS

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	React, Angular

**API Technologies:**
	Web API, REST/gRPC APIs, Microservices

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, Agile, automated testing

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS, Azure

**Other:**
	Kafka, PyTest, Git, code quality, problem-solving, communication
